entry.title: Saturday: Chance of showers. High 10. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud this morning. 30 percent chance of showers late this afternoon. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light early this morning. Wind becoming southwest 40 gusting to 60 near noon. High 10. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low zero. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming west 60 gusting to 80 this evening. Low zero. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Saturday 1 April 2023
